name: Flaming Cold
description:
PLAY THE DOWNLOADABLE VERSION FOR BETTER PERFORMANCE.

Once upon a time there was a world of fire and flames. The people of that world lived freely, using their powers of fire to their advantage, and building a society of their own. One of these people, was Atticus.

---------------------------------

Once upon a time there was a world of ice and snow. The people of that world lived freely, using their powers of ice to their advantage, and building a society of their own. One of these people, was Atticus.

One day, Atticus woke up in a place completely unfamiliar. It was so familiar, yet so different from anything he had seen before. Will he be able to find their way in this parallel world of his?

Ice Controls:
Arrows to move, Space to jump, Hold X to glide, Hold down + Hold X to form an ice spike.

Fire Controls:
Arrows to move, Space to jump, Press X to shoot a fire blast - the directional keys you hold will affect the direction of your blast.

This is a game made in a week for the LibGDX Jam of September 2020 by RedSponge.

(I forgot to add an easter egg for the Raeleus video -  does this count?)
